reviews.review: No, its only fun with you play with friends in a LAN. You can't play with your friends online and the servers are laggy and booring. You are limitated to play their dumb maps. Just a waste of money.
Um bom jogo cooperativo pra jogar com amigos e muito leve pra quem não tem uma máquina muito boa e as musicas são o ponto alto do jogo
Juegazo, la neta comprenlo no se van a arrepentir.
Better than KF2 due to the dark atmosphere where everything is more scary and simply better gameplay. 10/10 one of the best survival games i've ever played.

Great coop game, I played a LOT with my friends before they abandoned me, many good custom maps are available, hours of fun, not sure how active it is now, but it was fun back in the day. But remember, your friends will abandon you for fucking League of Legends or something shitty and you will stay alone playing with the idea of killing yourself and taking antidepressants in your thirties. 

Game is recommend. Killing Floor 2 is recommended too.
really great zombie game super intense theres no game that out plays this zombie game. love the music love the gore. This is the game to let off some steam xD

[b]Ein Zombie Shooter, der mit Freundin sicherlich kurze Zeit unterhalten kann, aber kauft euch lieber direkt Teil 2.[/b] 

[h1] Pro: [/h1] 
- Unterschiedliche Klassen
- Schönes Co-op Erlebnis

[h1] Kontra: [/h1]  
- Keine Story
- Eigentlich nur schießen und überleben
- Bringt Freunde mit

[h1] Für Erfolgsjäger: [/h1]   
251...ihr könnt euch also vorstellen das dauert etwas länger für die 100%. Hier ist auch wieder alles dabei, von einfachen Erfolgen, die nebenbei kommen und auch welche für die ihr eine echt gute Gruppe und viel Einsatz braucht.


[h1] Fazit[/h1]
Die Auswahl an Klassen und Waffen, der Shop und die taktischen Möglichkeiten in den Wellen bietet erstmals Anreiz. Das Spiel ist allerdings schon älter was man auch merkt und es wird schnell langweilig. Mit 5 Freunden hätte es vielleicht noch was, aber da ich keine 5 Freunde mit diesem Spiel besitze habe ich sehr schnell die Lust verloren.
You can run this game on a 2011 Macbook Pro. Only crashes now and again!
uma delicia pra junta os amigos e mata uns zeds e ainda e leva roda em qualquer pc
Juegardo para jugar con amigos, aunque tambien se puede solo
Было много всего,с меня был донат,давно не играл все пропало ( так бы поиграл еще)
Mt foda pra jogar com os amigos, pra jogar sozinho nem tanto assim
dalga dalga gelen düşmanları kesip, ekipmanınızı güçlendiriyorsunuz. gayet zevkli.
damnation, l' une des meilleurs map en mode story. Je ne me lasserai jamais de ce jeu . simple mais efficace un vraie moment de detente a tuer du zombie a la chaine.
Still a great game. It's still more satisifying killing the zombies in this game than KF2. The sound effects are way better. so glad its on linux
The most metal survival co-op. Has a certain dark, edgy, and grimy atmosphere that the second game doesn't have. Put on some extreme metal, blast some guts out and bathe in gore.

Hermoso juego ✨ sigue siendo una joya ❤️ si una vez esta el bundle DLC en oferta comprenlo, vale la pena! 100/100 Recomendado! ❤️

*Los servidores sigue muy activo y con buenos ping, excelente servidores y encontraras un servidor dedicado ati sin ningún lagaso ;)*
Un clásico que no puede faltar en la biblioteca, recomendado.
ITS A FUCKING BLOODBATH THAT I LIKE >:D
an ok game but id prefer not to play it that much

На данный момент игра практически исчерпала себя.  Нет, в неё интересно играть, просто Killing Floor 2 делает всё лучше и удобнее, чем первая. Единственное, за что можно похвалить KF1 и поругать KF2 на данный момент, так это за атмосферу. Здесь и карты мрачные, и фонарик есть только на 2-3 пушках, и в целом, дизайн локаций и зедов имеет такой особенный хоррор-стиль. Даже тот же худощавый мясник смотрится более жутко, чем его собрат-качок из второй части. А отбивальщик может дать на средней сложности такой пи*ды, что теперь его накаченная версия в KF2 кажется мне мышкой.

Есть 1 вырвиглазный минус: монстры спаунятся чуть ли не за углом около игрока, мне даже удавалось заметить, как они спаунятся в воздухе и приземляются.

Looking back to this brings back a lot of memories...

Though, looking at the old servers that I've used to play on, now empty and abandoned.
It just makes me feel sad. I've always wondered if those players I've met on KF2, Were one of the many players that have played this old gem before...

And if they do... Will they come back here and revive the golden era of the old servers once more?
Es un juego muy completo, los enemigos tanto como los sonidos y los disparos, si estas pensando en jugar este maravilloso juego es mejor jugarlo con amigos ya que es mas entretenido 10/10 este juego.

Bom, Killing Floor. O que dizer de um game específico coop zombies shooter que foi lançado a mais de 1 década atrás!?!?!? Enfim, este game sem dúvidas veio a se tornar um bom caminho para aqueles que já estão habituados com um bom e velho estilo de jogo parecido com o L4D (Killing Floor 2). A jogabilidade é boa, os comandos são fáceis e intuitivos e o game em si é bem bacana. Eu o possuía na minha antiga e velha steam, e pra epoca ele rodava bem no meu notebook fraco. O unico problema é que ABSOLUTAMENTE NINGUÉM mais joga, então se você busca um game para farmar cartas & conquistas (mesmo que solo), este é o título para você que busca exatamente isso! Alem disso, não aconselho a comprar pois sera apenas mais um joguinho que ficara largado em sua biblioteca.
Superb co-op shooter, you will love it no matter when you are reading this.
He jugado mas de 1000 horas y no me arrepiendo de nada!

[b][u][h1]An overly simplified and accurate representation KF1[/h1][/u][/b]
Dosh

excelente juego para jugar con amigos y pasar bien el rato, superando oleadas de zeds , es genial lo único que le sumaria seria que ojala pudiera ser mas fácil jugar con un amigo en linea sin necesidad de mecerte a un server , pero fuera de eso, 10/10
Very fun fast paced survival horror. Always find myself coming back to this one.

Un juego que es bastante desafiante, y si te descuida puede matarte el enemigo más choto bastante entretenido más si jugas con amigos. Boss dificil pero balanceado si sabe como enfrentarlo, recomendado para la gente que le gusta los zombies y también para enojarse bastante. Porque este juego me dio casi muchas broncas

Um clássico, ate hoje rende várias horas de jogatina em modo cooperativo, gosto muito.

В своё время наиграл часов 50 в компании друзей. На этом аккаунте статистикой похвастать не могу, но мысль оставлю.

Несмотря на то, что игра явно устарела - благодаря задумке и механикам играется она неплохо. И как следствие: может обеспечить приятное времяпровождение с товарищами, позволяя прочувствовать тимворк на более высоких уровнях сложности.

So fun to solo or play with friends or even strangers. Shows its age for sure, but the jank ads to the brutality. KF2 is honestly a compeltely different game to this one. While they are close in price and KF2 is a better game. This one is still loads of fun. It is nice how the community game and developers share the space with respect.
Super cheap game, zero replay but was good fun with friends.

No tengo críticas. Súper divertido y no es tan fácil flamear a tu compañero.

6/10 some good fun here but feels incredibly graphicaly and UX dated
